algorithms module¶

algorithms.triplet_algorithms(f, S, X0, d, descent_alg, step_size_func, iters=100, epsilon=0.001, proj=None)¶

File contains the main triplets algorithm [still needs work]

Parameters:
  • f (python function with specific structure) – objective function
  • S (list of lists) – set of triplets
  • X0 (a d dimensional vector) – starting iterate
  • d (int) – ambient dimesnion
  • descent_alg (function) – choice for descent method (e.g. full_gradient/sgd etc.)
  • iters (int) – number of iterations
  • epsilon (int) – Accuracy parameter
